recipesJson.name: Waterdragon
recipesJson.author: souporman
recipesJson.description: Buddy wanted a watermelon dragon fruit juice, so I whipped this up. Came out much better than expected.

reviews.text: I was curious. Mixed it up, and man, is it ever good. Watermelon isn't an assault on the buds. Pretty well balanced. It could be tweaked a touch. But still amazing as is.  I give it 4 stars because I feel like it's missing a little something. But it's still GREAT!
Good simple mix, amazing after 3 days and just keeps getting better. A friend of mine can't get enough of this stuff and for that reason, I give it 5 stars!
